body_html: @ngimel Unfortunately, these checks current live in the Python bindings to ATen (in torch/autograd/generated). It would be a good idea to move the checks to ATen. It should be simple enough to add a test inside the native function though.
body_text: @ngimel Unfortunately, these checks current live in the Python bindings to ATen (in torch/autograd/generated). It would be a good idea to move the checks to ATen. It should be simple enough to add a test inside the native function though.
body: @ngimel Unfortunately, these checks current live in the Python bindings to ATen (in torch/autograd/generated). It would be a good idea to move the checks to ATen. It should be simple enough to add a test inside the native function though.
